fields.summary: [CI] Nightly hdfs integration test job fails

comments.body:
Ok, the issue description is really misleading. Your link points to a crash which doesn't exist anymore.
Instead, the current builds don't crash, they fail two tests.
https://github.com/ursa-labs/crossbow/runs/1204680589

Please don't use "crash" when there's no crash, because it's misleading.
I opened ARROW-10264 for the failing URI test (which I would think should work)
